gurmukhi: piRQm pRwx dw pd ko su kib bKwnIAY ] cwr bwr niRp Sbd qvn ky TwnIAY ] Air kih nwm qupk ky hiRdy pCwnIAY ] ho suDin svYXw BIqr infr bKwnIAY ]1271]
transliteration: Pritham Praan Daa Pad Ko Su Kabi Bakhaaneeai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Ke Thaaneeai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Hride Pachhaadeeai|| Ho Sudhan(i) Sawaiyaa Bheetar Nidar Bakhaaneeai||1271||
translation: Saying firstly the wod “Praan”, add the word “Nrip” four times and then uttering the word “ari” t the end, know the names of Tupak.1271.

gurmukhi: jIvdq pd piRQm aucwrn kIjIAY ] cwr bwr niRp Sbdih AMq BxIjIAY ] Air kih nwm qupk ky hiRdy pCwn lY ] ho khI hmwrI Awj hiRdy pihcwn lY ]272]
transliteration: Jeevdat Pad Pritham Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabadah(i) Ant Bhaneejeeai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Hride Pachhaad Lai|| Ho Kahihamaariaaj Hride Paihchanndlai||1272||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Jeevdat, add the word “Nrip” four times and considering my words as true to-day and adding the word “ari” at the end know all the names of Tupak.1272.

gurmukhi: bpudw pd ko piRQm aucwrhu ] cwr bwr nwiek pd fwrhu ] S`qRu Sbd ko bhur Bix`jY ] nwm qupk ky sB lih il`jY ]1273]
transliteration: Bapudaa Pad Ko Pritham Oucdaroh|| Chaar Baar Naaik Pad Daroh|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bhanijjai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Lah(i) Lijjai||1273||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Bapudaa”, add the word “Naayak” four times and then uttering the words “Shatru” at the end know all the names of Tupak.1273.

gurmukhi: bhur dyhdw Sbd bKwno ] cwr bwr piq Sbd pRmwno ] Air kih nwm qupk ky lhIAY ] JUlw CMd bIic his khIAY ]1274]
transliteration: Bahur Dehdaa Shabad Bakhaano|| Chaar Baar Pat(i) Shabad Pamaano|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Laheeai|| Jhoolaa Chhand Beech(i) Has(i) Kaheeai||1274||
translation: Saying the word “Dehda”, add the word “Pati” four times and then adding the word “ari” at the end, use smilingly the names of Tupak in Jhoolaa Stanza.1274.

gurmukhi: pRwx d`q pd piRQm BxIjY ] cwr bwr niRp Sbd DrIjY ] Air pd qwky AMq bKwnhu ] sB sRI nwm qupk ky jwnhu ]1275]
transliteration: Praan Datt Pad Pritham Bhaneejai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabad Ddareejai|| Ar(i) Pad Taake Ant Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jaanoh||1275||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Praandat”, add the word “Nrip” four times and then adding the word “ari” at the end, know all the names of Tupak.1275.

gurmukhi: jrw Sbd khu muK so Awid bKwnIAY ] irp kih niRp pd bwr cwr Puin TwnIAY ] S`qRu Sbd ko qw ky AMq bKwn kY ] ho skl qupk ky nwm lIjIAY jwn kY ]1276]
transliteration: Jaraa Shabad Kauh Moukh So Aadh Bakhaaneeai|| Rip Kah(i) Nrip Pad Baar Chaar Phoun(i) Thaaneeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taa Ke Ant Bakhaan Kai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Leejeeai Jaan Kai||1276||
translation: Uttering the word “Jaraa” form the mouth, add the word “Ripu” and then the word “Nrip” four times, then adding the word “Dhatru” at the end know the names of Tupak.1276.

gurmukhi: piRQm ibrDqw Sbd aucwrn kIjIAY ] S`qRu Sbd ko qwky AMq BnIjIAY ] bhur S`qRu pd iqh auprwNq bKwnIAY ] ho skl qupk ky nwm cqur icq jwnIAY ]1277]
transliteration: Pritham Birdhataa Shabad Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taake An Bhaneejeeai|| Bahur Shattru Pad Tih Oupraant Bakhaaneeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Chit Jaaneeai||1277||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Vriddhatta”, add the word “Shatru” after that and also add the word “Shatru” again, then know all the names of Tupak.1277.

gurmukhi: jrw Sbd khu Awid aucrIAY ] hir pd AMq qvn ky DrIAY ] Air pd muK qy bhur bKwnY ] nwm qupk ky hoie pRmwnY ]1278]
transliteration: Jaraa Shabad Kauh Aadh Udareeai|| Har(i) Pad Ant Tavan Ke Dareeai|| Ar(i) Pad Moukh Te Bahur Bakhaaneeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Hoe Pramaanai||1278||
translation: Uttering the word “Jaraa”, add the word “Hari” to it and then uttering the word “ari” from the mouth, know all the names of Tupak authentically.1278.

gurmukhi: Awls Sbd su muK qy Awid bKwnIAY ] cwr bwr niRp Sbd su Air kih TwnIAY ] skl qupk ky nwm jwn ijX lIjIAY ] ho CMd pwDVI mwNJ infr hoie dIjIAY ]1279]
transliteration: Aalas Shabad Su Moukh Te Aadh Bakhaaneeai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabad Su Ar(i) Kah(i) Thaaneeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Jiya Leejeeai|| Ho Chhand Paadhadinidar Hoe Deejeeai||1279||
translation: Saying the word “Aalasaya”, add the word “Nrip” four times the nadd the word “ari” and in this way know all the names of Tupak and use them fearlessly in Paadhari stanza.1279.

gurmukhi: qrn dMq pd muK qy Awid bKwnIAY ] Air kih niRp pd bwr cwr pun TwnIAY ] Air kih nwm qupk ky hiRdY bKwnIAih ] ho CNMd ruAwlw ibKY infr hoie TwnIAih ]1280]
transliteration: Taran Dant Pad Moukh Te Aadh Bakhaaneeai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Nrip Pad Baar Chaar Poun Thaaneeai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Hridai Bakhaaneeaih|| Ho Chhand Ruaalaa Bikhai Nidar Hoe Thaaneeaih||1280||
translation: Saying the word “Tarundant”, from the month, add the word “ari”, then uttering the word “Nrip” four times and adding the word “ari” describe the names of Tupak in Ruaalaa stanza.1280.
